directions: Bring water to boil in medium saucepan. Remove from heat. Add tea bags; steep 3 minutes. Remove tea bags; pour tea into pitcher. Add sugar to taste and stir until sugar dissolves. Cool. (Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)
Mix fruit in bowl. Divide among four 16-ounce glasses. Pour 1/4 cup wine, then 1 cup tea into each glass. Fill glasses with ice cubes and serve.
ingredients: 1 peach or apple, peeled, pitted or seeded, chopped
1 orange, all peel and white pith removed, cut into 3/4-inch pieces
title: Iced Tea Sangria with Fresh Fruit
